about.title: From Saving Princesses to Building Full-Stack Solutions
about.zeldaParagraph: It started with The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past. As a nine-year-old, I was captivated by the grand adventure of rescuing Princess Zelda from Ganon. I didn`t know it then, but navigating those digital worlds would eventually spark a lifelong obsession with how they were built.
about.perlenspielParagraph: My professional path into engineering began with a similar challenge: a player, a key, and a locked door. Implementing that logic in the <perlenspielLink>Perlenspiel gameclavier</perlenspielLink> was my first real taste of programming. Today, I translate that same problem-solving drive into building full-stack applications‚Äîcurrently specializing in React frontends, .NET Core backends, and Azure cloud services.
about.quoteParagraph: I am a firm believer in the iterative nature of software craftsmanship. My goal with every project is to bring raw ideas to fruition through a disciplined workflow: <quoteStyle>"Make it work, make it right, make it fast." ‚ÄîKent Beck</quoteStyle>
about.introToMiniLevelParagraph: Below is a small piece of where it all started‚Äîa mini-level I rebuilt to honor the engine that first launched my career.
